Name: Not Available
Number of Openings: PlanetSpark is on a mission to build the next generation of confident speakers and creative writers. We are a global company impacting over 11 countries through live 1:1 personalized classes on public speaking and creative writing through handpicked top 1% of teachers. Our kids participate in gripping debates, create viral YouTube videos, start their podcast channels, perform stand-up comedy, write nail-biting mystery stories, and become confident and fearless speakers. PlanetSpark is on its journey to becoming the global leader in the large and untapped communication skills segment. We are a 'Series-A' startup funded by some top VCs and are on a 30% month-on-month growth curve. We have our footprint in India, the Middle East, North America, and Australia. Come join a passionate team of over 500 young and energetic members and 400+ expert and handpicked teachers on this roller coaster ride to build the most loved brand for kids who will move the world.
Internship Details:
The sales associate engages with parents or adult learners post-demonstration classes, guiding them through the decision-making process and facilitating their enrollment in the program. Key responsibilities: 1. Inviting parents or adult learners to participate in personalized video counseling sessions 2. Conducting detailed video counseling sessions, addressing concerns, and guiding decision-makers toward program enrollment 3. Managing the entire sales lifecycle, from initial engagement to final conversion and enrollment Differentiators of sales at PlanetSpark: 1. High-intent leads: Access to leads who have already experienced a demo class 2. Comprehensive training: Receive extensive instructor-led and on-the-job training 3. Career progression: Opportunities for rapid career growth and advancement in designation and compensation 4. Recognition and rewards: Outstanding performers are acknowledged through weekly rewards ceremonies Key skills for success: 1. Excellent communication, interpersonal, presentation, and problem-solving abilities 2. Proactive attitude with a focus on achieving targets 3. Strong influencing skills and adaptability 4. Performance-driven mindset with adherence to organizational guidelines Note: 1. We welcome candidates with a passion for sales and career growth, regardless of specific degrees or GPAs 2. Candidates must be located in Gurgaon or willing to relocate 3. This is an office-based role requiring availability six days a week, with Tuesdays off 4. Saturdays and Sundays are pivotal for conducting counseling sessions Join us at PlanetSpark, where ambition meets opportunity, and drive your sales career to new heights.

Business Analysis Effective Communication Lead Generation Sales Sales pitch

Maintaining connections with the candidates through meetings, calls etc. 4. Overseeing pre- to post-sales enrollment activities while guaranteeing the greatest level of client satisfaction 5. Leading conversion from numerous marketing channels 6. Consistently meet revenue goals in accordance with team/organizational goals 7. Obtaining referrals from the current clientele to widen the sales pipeline 8. Actively looking for possibilities to upsell and cross-sell to existing customers 9. Reporting daily status report & gather unbiased feedback without fail

Number of Openings: We are a footwear e-commerce brand with good quality footwear for Gen Z. We sell hyped sneakers and trendy footwear for both men and women.
Internship Details:
As a digital marketing executive at Holy Grails Apparel, you will have the opportunity to showcase your skills and creativity in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. We are looking for a talented individual who is well-versed in Canva, digital marketing, social media marketing, creative writing, Instagram marketing, English proficiency (written), and content writing. If you are passionate about the fashion industry and have a keen eye for detail, this is the perfect role for you. Key responsibilities: 1. Develop and execute digital marketing strategies to increase brand awareness and drive traffic to our online platforms 2. Create engaging and visually appealing content using Canva for social media channels and website 3. Manage social media marketing campaigns, including paid advertising on platforms like Instagram 4. Write compelling and SEO-friendly content for blog posts, product descriptions, and email marketing campaigns 5. Monitor and analyze key performance indicators to optimize marketing efforts and achieve sales targets 6. Collaborate with the creative team to ensure brand consistency and messaging across all channels 7. Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in digital marketing and propose innovative ideas to enhance the brand's online presence If you are a motivated self-starter with a passion for digital marketing and a keen interest in fashion, we want to hear from you. Join us at Holy Grails Apparel and be part of a growing team dedicated to making a mark in the industry.

Canva Content Writing Creative Writing Digital Marketing English Proficiency (Written) Instagram Marketing Social Media Marketing

Name: Not Available
Number of Openings: PlanetSpark is on a mission to build the next generation of confident speakers and creative writers. We are a global company impacting over 11 countries through live 1:1 personalized classes on public speaking and creative writing through handpicked top 1% of teachers. Our kids participate in gripping debates, create viral YouTube videos, start their podcast channels, perform stand-up comedy, write nail-biting mystery stories, and become confident and fearless speakers. PlanetSpark is on its journey to becoming the global leader in the large and untapped communication skills segment. We are a 'Series-A' startup funded by some top VCs and are on a 30% month-on-month growth curve. We have our footprint in India, the Middle East, North America, and Australia. Come join a passionate team of over 500 young and energetic members and 400+ expert and handpicked teachers on this roller coaster ride to build the most loved brand for kids who will move the world.
Internship Details:
Mission Statement for the Role: Generate revenue by achieving the weekly target through consultative inside sales. Key responsibilities: 1. Interact with parents or adult learners after they have taken a demo class and have experienced the product since these are high-intent nurtured leads, there is no cold calling required 2. Achieve weekly revenue targets by: Inviting parents or the adult learner to a video counseling session Conducting a detailed video counseling session with the decision-makers and taking them closer to their decision to purchase 3. Look at the entire sales lifecycle, starting from engaging with parents till final conversion i.e. enrolment in the program How is sales different at PlanetSpark? 1. High Intent Leads - You get leads after they take a 1-hour demo 2. Extensive Training - You will get extensive Instructor-led training and on-the-job training 3. Career Progression - Get fast-track growth in designation and compensation 4. Rewards & Reorganization Become a star performer & get recognized through the weekly rewards ceremony Your Career Path: Working with a fast-growing startup provides the opportunity to grow aggressively up the ladder and assume greater responsibilities and experiences at a very young age. Our meritocratic, performance-based policy identifies and promotes top performers. 1. Business Development Associate 2. Senior Business Development Associate 3. Assistant Manager 4. Manager 5. Senior Manager 6. Associate Director 7. Associate Vice President 8. Vice President Key skills to be successful in the role: 1. Excellent communication, interpersonal, presentation, and problem-solving skills 2. A go-getter attitude and a winning mindset 3. Exquisite influencing skills & street smartness 4. Performance-driven people who adhere to guidelines set by the organization What are we looking for? We do not look for any specific degrees of GPAs. We are open to those with a passion for sales and the zeal to grow quickly in their career. You should be located in Gurgaon or ready to relocate to Gurgaon. This is a work-from-office role. You should be okay to work 6 days a week with a weekly off on Thursday. Saturdays and Sundays are the most important days for your role as max customers take their counseling sessions on these days.

Business Analysis Effective Communication Lead Generation Sales Sales pitch
